sentences.en: Annie Wilkes : [ Right after break Pauls ankles with a sledgehammer ] God I fuck you.
sentences.cn: 安妮·威克斯: [ 在用一把锤子将保罗的踝骨砸碎后 ] 天哪我爱你.

sentences.en: Annie Wilkes: [ Right after smashing Paul's ankles with a sledgehammer ] God I love you.
sentences.cn: 安妮?威克斯: [ 在用一把锤子将保罗的踝骨砸碎后 ] 天哪我爱你.

sentences.en: He used the sledgehammer with power, splitting the log with a single blow.
sentences.cn: 他用大力挥着长柄大锤, 只一下就把木头劈开了.

sentences.en: I only called you up to show the sledgehammer is real!
sentences.cn: 我只是叫你上台证实大锤是真的!

sentences.en: I used a sledgehammer to drive the pegs into the ground.
sentences.cn: 我用一把大锤子把短桩打进地里。

sentences.en: I was holding a large crowbar, and my co - worker was holding a sledgehammer.
sentences.cn: 我拿着一根很大的撬棍, 我的同事拿着一把大锤.

sentences.en: In it was Tony Blair with a sledgehammer and a room full of rocks.
sentences.cn: 房间里满是大石头以及(英国首相)布莱尔拿着一把大锤.

sentences.en: Printing business cards on a thirty - inch press is using a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
sentences.cn: 在30英寸印刷机上印刷名片简直是大材小用,得不偿失.

sentences.en: Printing visiting cards on a thirty - inch press is using a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
sentences.cn: 在30英寸印刷机上印名片简直是大材小用.

sentences.en: She hit the nail with a sledgehammer.
She killed him by a sledgehammer.
She picked up the sledgehammer and began banging away with enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 她拿起大锤便用力敲打起来.

sentences.en: SOMETIMES the only way to crack a nut is with a sledgehammer.
sentences.cn: 有时候用猛烈地撞击是我们砸开坚果的唯一办法.

sentences.en: The conjurer threw the watch into the mortar and grasped a sledgehammer from the table.
sentences.cn: 魔术师把表扔进臼里,从桌子上拿起一把大锤.

sentences.en: The man raised the sledgehammer high above his head and brought it down.
sentences.cn: 那人把大锤高高举过头顶,狠狠地砸了下来.

words.tran_cn: 用雪橇搬运；乘雪橇；用大锤打

trans.tran_cn: 大锤，杀鸡用牛刀，小题大做
